text: @NYGovCuomo @RonKlopfanstein @CovidActNow Governor, I urge you to order a quarantine for everyone traveling to NY from states where #COVID19 is getting out of control.  Please do this regardless of mode of travel - whether by air, train, bus or pov. Thank you!
